PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such high V oc of almost 1 V is consistent with the low - lying HOMO energy level of PSFDTBT.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| V |
| HOMO energy level |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Value of material property":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1 V |
| HOMO energy level |

The entity "V" refers to the value of the voltage, which is a material property of the material being discussed. The entity "HOMO energy level" refers to the energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO), which is also a material property.
